name: qa_template
description: Clean Q&A template with centered profile picture and question/answer layout

samples.question: What is renewable energy?
samples.answer: One wind turbine can power 1,500 homes annually!

fieldPrompt.question: Write a clear, concise question (3-4 words, max 25 characters) that grabs attention and encourages engagement. Examples: Why Choose Us?, How It Works?, What's Next?. Focus on topics that matter to your audience and create curiosity.
fieldPrompt.answer: Provide a detailed, informative answer (max 120 characters) that directly addresses the question. Include interesting facts, statistics, or insights when possible to make it more engaging and valuable. Be specific and actionable.
fieldPrompt.username: Enter your username or brand name (max 50 characters) that will be displayed as the source of this Q&A. Examples: @yourbrand, @expert, Your Company. Use your preferred professional identity.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (max 20 characters) where people can learn more about you or your business. Examples: yourbusiness.com, learn.yourbrand.com. Omit http:// for a cleaner look.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Choose a hex color code (4-7 characters) that matches your brand identity or the mood you want to convey. Examples: #795548 for brown, #4A90E2 for blue. Select colors that align with your brand and create the right emotional response.
